document.full_text: without chauncey billups and with amar'e stoudemire coping with a sore back, the knicks did not have the manpower to defeat rajon rondo and the celtics in game 3.
document.title: on basketball: with rondo at point, celtics show knicks what they lack
lines_and_colors: without chauncey billups and with amar'e stoudemire coping with a sore back, the knicks did not have the manpower to defeat rajon rondo and the celtics in game 3.
